author: Daniel Greene
description:
In this video, I share my full journey of publishing Neon Ghosts, including how much money I earned, the challenges I faced, and the lessons I learned along the way. Whether you’re an aspiring author, indie publisher, or just curious about the reality of making money from writing, this video will give you an honest, behind-the-scenes look at the publishing process.

📝 What’s Covered in This Video:
My experience writing and publishing Neon Ghosts.
How much money I made from the book, including royalties, expenses, and profits.
The biggest challenges in indie publishing and how I overcame them.
Tips for first-time authors looking to publish their books.
What I’d do differently if I could start over.
💡 Who This Video Is For:
Aspiring writers who want to know what it’s like to publish a book.
Indie authors looking for tips on maximizing book sales and navigating the publishing world.
Readers curious about the behind-the-scenes of creating Neon Ghosts.

title: How Much Money I Made Publishing Neon Ghosts👻💰 Lessons Learned 📚 & Life Update
